= sort =
== bucket sort ==

- data must have a limited range. so we could split bucket.
- map data to bucket, add do insert sort in bucket
- chain all buckets to output sorted result.

== index sort ==
index sort is one special case of bucket sort.

- it use value base on index or base for mapping.
- It do one more bucket sort instead of insert sort IN bucket.
